rawContent:
I asked ChatGPt about how AI art works: Is it just a great big remix bot?

The actual intelligence, then, still resides in the humans who made the corpus of images -- NOT in the machine.

The machine has just gotten very efficient at sifting, micro-plagiarizing, and remixing. https://t.co/QlUJJ2oSib

media.altText: Synchrotron radiation, a shining light - A beam of energy, pure and bright - Emitting from electrons as they race - Around a circular, metallic space - - Accelerated by electric fields - They move at nearly the speed of light - Emitting photons in all directions - A beautiful, glowing spectrum of light - - From X-rays to terahertz - Synchrotron radiation has no bar - A tool for scientists, a source of knowledge - A treasure trove of information, a helpful college - - Thank you, synchrotron, for all you give - A source of light and knowledge, as long as we live
